# Increase Programmatic Revenue 20% to 100%
RevSense leverages machine learning, automation, and big data to increase programmatic revenue
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/figure-main-layer-1.svg)![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/figure-main-layer-2.svg)![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/figure-main-layer-3.svg)
## What Does RevSense Do
### Optimize Yield
Increase overall programmatic revenue 20-100% guaranteed
### Unify Data
Aggregate performance data from demand partners into one centralized reporting platform
### Automate Tag Management
Generate and manage all ad tags automatically
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-1.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-1.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-2.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-3.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-2.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-2.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-4.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-1.svg)
Yield Optimization System
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/figure-2.svg)
Machine Learning
Machine Learning is a form of artificial intelligence (AI), which allows computers to intuitively learn tasks. Our technology finds the most optimal setup for your ad stack and adjusts parameters in real time to achieve maximum yield.
The processors we built replace human guesswork while eliminating the natural constraints of manual inputs. Factors used to calculate and reach a perfectly optimized stack include: price floors, frequency caps, geolocations, devices, visibility, and over a dozen other variables we’ve carefully studied. This allows us to optimize for each user rather than overall audience segments.
Automation
The RevSense platform automates reporting and tag management, which fuels a critical function of RevSense: the yield optimization engine. By aggregating and standardizing data sets from demand partners, RevSense can make calculated decisions in real time.
The tag management system is responsible for executing the decisions our machine learning “brain” computes. The result is a hands-off platform that optimizes yield 24 hours a day.
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/figure-3.svg)
Unified Data
RevSense provides a central location for all ad-ops data by aggregating adserver and demand partner data feeds into a single user interface. Before reaching our UI, RevSense converts the data to a standardized system of reporting.
This process accounts for ad server discrepancies, demand partner discrepancies, fill rates, and other information essential to obtaining accurate performance metrics.
  * **Operational Efficiency:** Free up your resources from tedious ad-ops tasks
  * **Real-Time Revenue Optimization:** Increase your bottom line
  * **Analytics:** 360-degree view of your revenue and discrepancy reports


![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/screen.png)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-1.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-2.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-1.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-3.svg)
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/parallax-icon-3.svg)
Demand Management
We finally solved the inefficiencies and headaches of buyer management by letting you connect your buyers to our platform with the click of a button.
![](http://www.mthsense.com/images/figure-1.svg)
Revsense is, in part, a tag management tool that automates every process, from tag creation to floor adjustments. Our header bidding solution brings the latest in bidding technology to publishers without the headaches.
The quick and easy integration process starts and ends with a publisher naming their placements. From there, the Revsense tool automatically generates, manages, and optimizes all ad tags in a publisher’s stack. We are compatible with every demand source, making it easy to convert waterfall setups or optimize existing header bidding integrations.
## By The Numbers
### 100 Billion
Impressions Optimized
### 36 Percent
Average Increase In Overall Revenue Increase
### 100+
Publishers On Platform

generated_description:
### Mth Sense: A Glimpse Into the Future of Ad Tech

**Company Overview**  
Mth Sense is an innovative platform based in San Jose, California, primarily focusing on mobile on-device profiling and ad-serving. Founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch S12, Mth Sense emerged with a mission to tackle the inefficiencies of "blind" ads—those that lack targeting and relevance for the intended audience.

**What They Offer**  
At the heart of Mth Sense’s offerings is **RevSense**, a sophisticated system that leverages machine learning, big data, and automation to optimize programmatic advertising revenue. With the potential to boost revenue by 20% to 100%, RevSense automatically adjusts ad setups in real-time, optimizing parameters like price floors and frequency caps without manual intervention.

#### Key Features:
1. **Yield Optimization**: The platform claims to guarantee a significant increase in overall programmatic revenue.
2. **Unified Data**: Mth Sense aggregates data from various demand partners into a single reporting interface, simplifying analytics and decision-making.
3. **Automated Tag Management**: It automates the creation and management of ad tags, which streamlines operations for publishers and reduces everyday hassles in ad management.

**By the Numbers**  
- **100 billion** impressions optimized  
- **36%** average increase in revenue reported by users  
- Over **100 publishers** on the platform  

**The Team**  
Mth Sense is a lean operation with a team of 11 dedicated employees, all working together to push the boundaries of ad tech. Although specific partnerships are not disclosed, they have a robust group partner network to enhance their capabilities.

**Tags**: Their core focus areas include **privacy**, **advertising**, and improving efficiencies within the **San Francisco Bay Area** digital landscape.

**Conclusion**  
In a world flooded with automated ad solutions, Mth Sense stands out by putting the power of machine learning and automation directly into the hands of publishers. Their approach to giving advertisers a clearer view into their demographic targeting capabilities—while ensuring profitability—could redefine how brands connect with their audiences. If you're involved in programmatic advertising or looking to enhance your ad revenue, it's worth checking out what Mth Sense has to offer on their [website](http://www.mthsense.com/).
